Detailed Description

template<typename HPTYPE>
class cds::gc::hzp::details::HPGuardT< HPTYPE >

Hazard pointer guard.

It is unsafe to use this class directly. Instead of it the AutoHPGuard class should be used.

Template parameter:

  • HPTYPE - type of hazard pointer. It is HazardPtr for Michael's Hazard Pointer reclamation schema
